application.models module

class application.models.CustomAccountManager(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: django.contrib.auth.base_user.BaseUserManager

CustomAccountManager class extends BaseUserManager providing two additional methods create_superuser and create_user to create the superuser and user as without superuser we are unable to access the admin.

Parameters

BaseUserManager (class) – models.BaseUserManager class act as a superclass for CustomAccountManager class.

create_superuser(email, user_name, first_name, password, **other_fields)
create_user(email, user_name, first_name, password, **other_fields)

class application.models.NewUser(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: django.contrib.auth.base_user.AbstractBaseUser, django.contrib.auth.models.PermissionsMixin

Custom user model extends models.AbstractBaseUser class which provide the core implementation of user model and models.PermissionMixin class which provide

all the methods and database fields necessary to support Django’s permission model.

Parameters

  • AbstractBaseUser (class) – models.AbstractBaseUser class act as a superclass for NewUser model.

  • PermissionMixin (class) – models.PermissionMixin class inherited by NewUser model.

  • password (CharField) – Password

  • last_login (DateTimeField) – Last login

  • is_superuser (BooleanField) – Superuser status. Designates that this user has all permissions without explicitly assigning them.

  • email (EmailField) – Email address

  • user_name (CharField) – User name

  • first_name (CharField) – First name

  • image (ImageField) – Image

  • start_date (DateTimeField) – Start date

  • interest_form_submitted (BooleanField) – Interest form submitted

  • fb_link (URLField) – Fb link

  • linkedin_link (URLField) – Linkedin link

  • about (TextField) – About

  • is_staff (BooleanField) – Is staff

  • is_active (BooleanField) – Is active

  • score (IntegerField) – Score

  • groups (ManyToManyField) – Groups. The groups this user belongs to. A user will get all permissions granted to each of their groups.

  • user_permissions (ManyToManyField) – User permissions. Specific permissions for this user.

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

class application.models.Reply(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Model Reply extends django.db.models.Model inbuilt class for storing reply to the question with reply date, reply id, number of upvotes, number of downvotes, corresponding question instance and user who replied.

application.urls module

application.views module

application.views.Find_people_check(request)

Displays interest form initially and after filling up the form, it display the list of all the users with their hobbies.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to find the people e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

interestsform webpage if user not fill his/her interest otherwise findpeople webpage with list of all user with their hobbies.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.Notifications(request)

Displays all the notifications like getting a response for a question posted by the user, upvotes or downvotes received for replies, etc.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to goto Notifications webpage e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Notifications webpage which display all the notifications to the user.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.Reset_filter_people(request)

Resets the filter to find people and allow users to adjust filter from starting.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to reset filter to find people e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

findpeople webpage.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

Displays all the questions which are saved by the user.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to the Saved item webpage e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Saveditem webpage that shows all the item saved by the user.

HttpResponse object

Takes user to the update profile page from where he/she updates the details.

Parameters

Returns

updateprofile webpage which provide the options to update the user profile.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.Updateinterests(request)

Updates the user interests i.e. hobbies with there social media link like Facebook link, LinkedIn link. So that it is easier to find the people of same kind of interest and to link with them through social media.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to update interests of the user e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

findpeople webpage where user see all users interest and option to contact him e.g. facebook, LinkedIn.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.User_logout(request)

Returns

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.action_(request)

Authenticate the user by confirming their Email ID and password. If there is mismatch then it displays the warning and takes user to login page. On successful login, the user is redirected to samvadika home page.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the login action request e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Samvadika home webpage if user is authenticated or Login webpage for unauthenticated user.

Return type

HttpResponse object - if user is unauthenticated, HttpResponseRedirect object - if user is authenticated

application.views.answer(request)

Stores the replies to the question in the database and redirects user to the home page.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to answering the question(reply) e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Samvadika home webpage.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.filter_people(request)

Filters the people by hobbies. It also supports filtering people by multiple hobbies.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to filter user by their hobbies e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

findpeople webpage with list of all filtered user.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.filter_questions(request)

Filters the questions by tags and show all filtered question with their replies.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to filter questions by the tags e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

filterquestions webpage with list of all filtered question with their replies.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.filterbytags(request)

Takes the user to the webpage from where user filters the questions by specifying tag.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request for the tag filter e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

filterquestions webpage through which user chooses the tag to filter the questions.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.filtertag_save(request)

Filters the questions by tags and from there save functionality will be done.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to filter questions by the tags e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

filterquestions webpage with list of all filtered question with their replies.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.index(request)

Display the Samvadika home page if the user is authenticated otherwise takes user to the login webpage. It shows all the question with their thread ID, published date and question tag along with reply, save-item, like and dislike option.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata about the request e.g. HTTP request method used, IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Samvadika home webpage for authenticated user and login webpage for unauthenticated user.

Return type

HttpResponse object - for authenticated user, HttpResponseRedirect object - for unauthenticated user

application.views.posted(request)

Stores the posted question in the database and redirects user to the home page.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the question posting request e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Samvadika home webpage.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.register(request)

Successfully registers the new user by storing the details in the database. A warning message is displayed if there is a mismatch in password and confirm password fields, or if the email or username is already in use. Otherwise the user is redirected to the home page.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the signup action request e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Samvadika home webpage if user is successfully registered otherwise signup webpage.

Return type

HttpResponse object

Removes an already saved question from the Saved Items page

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the question posting request e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Saved Items webpage.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.signup(request)

Takes user to the Signup Webpage.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the signup request e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

Signup webpage for new registration.

Return type

HttpResponse object

application.views.update_email(request)

Updates the email of the user.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to update email of the user e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

updateprofile webpage with updated user email.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.update_fb_link(request)

Changes the Facebook profile link of the user.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to changed hobbies of the user e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

Returns

updateprofile webpage with updated Facebook Profile link.

Return type

HttpResponseRedirect object

application.views.update_hobbies(request)

Changes the Hobbies of the user.

Parameters

request (HttpRequest object) – contains the metadata of the request to changed hobbies of the user e.g. HTTP request method used, The IP address of the client etc.

:return:updateprofile webpage with updated user hobbies. :rtype: HttpResponseRedirect object
